keepConnect.name: Gumana ubucuti
keepConnect.helperText: Niwafyonda kuri link y’Itanguriro, rero nushireho link. Ivyo bisaba ko iyo link izosubirwamwo ubudasiba inyuma y’aho icitse.

url.name: URL
url.helperText: Link URL, nk'akarorero ws://192.168.0.2:7001, canke wws://akarorero/inzira
url.error: URL ibereye ni URL itangura na ws:// wws://
